description: This module is designed for students with no prior knowledge of Japanese. We aim to develop Japanese competence through handling various language tasks in daily life situations using basic linguistic and socio-cultural knowledge. Students will also learn how to read and write Hiragana and Katakana (Japanese scripts), as well as approximately 60 kanji (Chinese characters). Students with prior knowledge must contact the Centre for Language Studies to take a placement test.
title: Japanese 1
prerequisite: This module is meant for students with no prior knowledge of the target language. Students with prior knowledge (including spoken proficiency) must contact CLS to take a placement test.
